trends: There have been no other sightings in Etobicoke,Greater Toronto
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Beautiful sunset & a white orb surprise !
divs: sighting detailson a sunday of feb. 7th \ 2010 just before a sunset , i felt compelled to look at the beautiful colorful sky & the very unusual 3 large swan-like white cloud formations , that particular window faces the south-west . as i was standing & wondering about these clouds i've noticed the white sphere-light moving below , (at this point i've decided this time i'll try to take a photo of it), first from the lower regular cloud & gliding in & up , than past above the 3 swan-like clouds . i have 5 sequenced photographs of the ufo lights . after taking these i stood there admiring it for , perhaps a minute or so , at least that's how long it felt as i did not look at my wrist watch . my digital camera registered the time though while taking & trying to zoom in on the subject , & the recorded time begun at exactly 4:46 pm to 4:49 pm . after watching them for short while , the white sphere just disappeared :-( through my observations on these flying objects , especially the last 12-18 months , they seem to have a preferred routes , lol ! most times they fly in an exact line from the west to precise south of the usa , (i've checked on my sm. compass). btw , in the western sky that the ufos seem to fly from is where the toronto international airport is located , perhaps it is of some significance . ( also last year my friend noticed "lights" driving past the airport towards brampton & i've seen them again in the same flying pattern as usual & it is on his & another friend's insistence that i should start recording this 'phenomenon' in some form ). the 2nd "favourite" flyby route seems to be in a straight line from direct east towards exact south ! ( & always fly near or over the lake ) . as a footnote , i did forwarded this info along with attached jpeg photos to mr. jim moroney at the aufosg on sat. march 6th \ 2010. p.s. actually i am surprised at managing to 'capture' the ufo on my camera as it was some distance from where i reside & my camera is a simple kodak 10.3 mp with a 3x zoom only . p.s.s. on your media attachments i was only able to file 3 of the 5 photos that i've taken .
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
